H0.text: Who became the first Prime Minister of an independent Bangladesh in January 1972. Tajuddin Ahmad

H1.text: Who became the first Prime Minister of an independent Bangladesh in January 1972. Kamal Hossain

H2.text: Who became the first Prime Minister of an independent Bangladesh in January 1972. Abdul Malek Ukil

H3.text: Who became the first Prime Minister of an independent Bangladesh in January 1972. Mujib

A4.text: Awami League leader Sheikh Mujibur Rahman became the 2nd Prime Minister of Bangladesh on 12 January 1972

A5.text: As the leader of Bangladesh, he led the country as its president and prime minister from 1972 until his assassination in 1975

A6.text: The short film Interview with Bangladesh Prime Minister Mujbur Rahman (1972)
